#include <iostream>
#include <cstdio>
#include <math.h>

using namespace std;

int main()
{
    int t;
    scanf("%d", &t);
    while(t--)
    {
        long long int n;
        scanf("%lld", &n);
        long long int ans;
        if(n <= 2)
        {
            ans = n;
        }
        else if(n%2 != 0)
        {
            ans = n*(n-1)*(n-2);
        }
        else if(n%6 != 0)
        {
            ans = (n)*(n-1)*(n-3);
        }
        else
        {
            ans = (n-1)*(n-2)*(n-3);
        }

        printf("%lld\n", ans);
    }
    return 0;
}
